content: Our Patient Access API will require authentication for the third party application as well as the member. We (Aetna) have been discussing how non-member requests would be handled since they cannot be authenticated. After researching and taking all input into consideration we have made the decision to support only member-specific Formulary Services on day 1. @Dave Hill @Saul Kravitz @Robert Dieterle - I'm making you aware as this topic (authentication) was touched upon in last week's HL7/DaVinci PDex call.
It is probably a good idea to post this in the #Da Vinci or #Da Vinci PDex Drug Formulary stream...
Thanks! I posted it on that stream......I didn't even know it existed.
